snippet: LeFRAK--Ethel. February 1, 1920 -May 14, 2013 Grace was in all her steps, Heaven in her eye, in every gesture, dignity and love. She loved people. And all loved her. Her daily prayer was simply doing good. You are so loved and so missed, Denise and Family 1/3
lead_paragraph: LeFRAK--Ethel. February 1, 1920 -May 14, 2013 Grace was in all her steps, Heaven in her eye, in every gesture, dignity and love. She loved people. And all loved her. Her daily prayer was simply doing good. You are so loved and so missed, Denise and Family 1/3
